name: The Red Realm
description:
When 3 Teens discover a secret goverment file telling them about a ancient portal near them. They dont know whats ahead of them

This game is in development atm! meaning that it isn't finished and wont be for a while! feel free to download the game as i update it! Stay tuned for more updates!
